citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
Both the goats (approx 1 month) & rabbits (approx 2 months) are overdue on their veterinarian recommended
deworming schedules.
Following your veterinarian's recommended deworminig schedules greatly minimizes the risk of parasitic infections.
Follow your veterinarian recommended deworning schedules.
Correct by November 15, 2017
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee
